name: Top Mix
description:
Swipe. Make Music.

Now anyone can make music with the swipe of a finger! Top Mix allows you to mix songs by swiping through instrument options, just like swiping through filters for photos. Anyone can do it!

Think you have great musical taste? Enter Mix Challenges every day to see if you can win the opportunity to be featured in Top Mix!

** For more information regarding risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures related to this product, visit https://www.topmixmusic.com/safety
